featured.text: The drug dealer was ________ by the police while he was selling cocaine to a high school student.

definition.zh_def: 可卡因是一種強效的中樞神經興奮劑，通常從可可樹的葉子中提取，具有高度成癮性。
definition.en_def: Cocaine is a powerful central nervous system stimulant derived from the leaves of the coca plant, known for its high potential for addiction.
definition.example: He was arrested for possession of cocaine.
